thread.title: Emotional’ Amber Rose forgives ex flames Kanye, Wiz for their hurtful comments
thread.title_full: Emotional’ Amber Rose forgives ex flames Kanye, Wiz for their hurtful comments

author: NewsWire
title: Emotional’ Amber Rose forgives ex flames Kanye, Wiz for their hurtful comments
text:
Added on October 5, 2015 NewsWire Emotional’ Amber Rose forgives ex flames Kanye, Wiz for their hurtful comments 0 0 0 0 0 
Washington. D.C., Oct.5 (ANI): Amber Rose recently turned emotional in front of a huge throng, breaking down in tears while hosting a Slut Walk event in Los Angeles. 
The 31-year-old model, who hosted her first ever transnational movement event in L.A, said she has forgiven former boyfriend Kanye West and former husband Wiz Khalifa for their hurtful comments about her, TMZ. com reports. 
Speaking about the ‘Shell Shocked’ hit -maker, the model said it was “extremely hurtful” to hear him refer to her as just a ‘stripper’. 
Talking about West, the hip hop model admitted that the ‘Four Five Seconds’ singer said that “he felt like he needed 30 showers after hooking up with her.”(ANI)
